column1: It’s impt that we use every tool in our toolbox to stop hackers & bad actors esp as so much of #US workforce is relying on tech bc of #COVID19.   Thank you to my bipartisan colleagues for working w me to prioritize the safety of the American people online.

In my last @HouseAppropsGOP @AppropsDems cycle in #congress I'll continue to champion #cyber #telecommunications issues especially as #US workforce is disrupted and displaced as a result of #COVID19. https://t.co/MmCQ0KrAmY
Smart move @AjitPaiFCC. Especially w/ so much of our workforce displaced & teleworking bc of #COVID19 security is #1. https://t.co/uEJN8t8u2V
Did you know that tomorrow 6/12 @CVSHealth is launching 3 new #COVID19 testing locations in NW GA?   Find your nearest drive-thru test locations here: https://t.co/qNKop4R55X
Last week I asked @CDCgov @CDCDirector about #COVID19 antibodies. How much do we know about this type of testing?   From @romenewstribune: https://t.co/AABRdBh4Hy

Today I questioned @CDCgov @CDCDirector about #COVID19 antibodies. Should we be testing simultaneously for #coronavirus & the presence of antibodies? How much do we know about antibodies right now? https://t.co/Ke4v6mNggT
If you’re a farmer or a rancher whose work has been affected by COVID-19 you can apply for help through the @USDA Coronavirus Food Assistance Program here: https://t.co/XI3EM4C0oz

Do you have questions about the resources available to help you your family or your employees during this health crisis?   This page on my website is dedicated to sharing #coronavirus resources like #PaycheckProtectionProgram info  & FAQs about the IRS.   https://t.co/2aU1PqNrT8 https://t.co/BudzYVOTiU

Did you know that employees unable to work due to #COVID19 quarantine are entitled to paid sick leave for up to 10 days? If you are an employer who provides paid sick leave you could claim a tax credit. Read more here: https://t.co/jO3EZwR7T2
ICYMI: @SBAgov is now hiring temporary employees to help with #COVID19 disaster relief efforts. Follow the link to apply https://t.co/a1JW7mv3ku

More than 2.7m Georgians have received their coronavirus economic impact payment from @IRSnews.   If you have questions or if you are eligible & haven't received yours yet check out these FAQs: https://t.co/LbTwELbscD

Last month @DeptVetAffairs mental health providers completed more than 34k appointments with veterans using the VA Video Connect.  Learn more about #telehealth & #VA response to #coronavirus: https://t.co/5JKJrnvDwC https://t.co/Prpe0UGvsI
Great to see our #Dalton community stepping up to help those on the front lines fighting the spread of #coronavirus. Thank you! #InItTogether @ajc  https://t.co/gulfKcPfDl
Great news for our #Dalton community - $255543 in Community Development Block Grant funding to combat the spread of #coronavirus.   From @dailycitizen https://t.co/DdS6ZVY4Ov
.@fema is looking for help to fight against #COVID19. If your business has medical supplies or personal protective equipment (PPEs) to donate please fill out this form: https://t.co/JFZhePY2r6.

BUSINESS RELIEF: @GovKemp & @SBAGov announced that small businesses across #GA can apply for low-interest federal disaster loans. The loans can provide working capital to help ease the economic burden businesses are experiencing because of the #coronavirus.

THREAD: As #coronavirus continues to affect businesses travel schools & our health care systems there are a number of helpful federal & state resources you can access for help & info.   As always please reach out if we can help you navigate this path forward.
Did you know @GaDPH launched a hotline to help answer your questions about #coronavirus? ☎️ https://t.co/p7ceW19s8n

As more info and news about #coronavirus becomes available you can check out https://t.co/fEvlaC0vRM for helpful resources.   Please reach out to my office if we can be of assistance navigating this path forward. We are here to help.

#Coronavirus is having a major impact on employers employees & biz. If you are currently job searching or are facing suspended or reduced hours because of #coronavirus @employgeorgia is a great resource. Right now there are more than 101k jobs posted on https://t.co/PUZdweXRU5

You can check out this page on my website for info about #coronavirus D.C. tours & international travel over the next few weeks. If you have any questions please get in touch. We are here to help.   https://t.co/IqOPSazLbt
.@GaDPH has a number of pages dedicated to information about #coronavirus in our state. Check it out here: https://t.co/rPTGtmAvaM

As info & updates about #coronavirus becomes available my office will work to share resources with you.   https://t.co/ZrlplGRrBm has helpful steps for how to stay healthy & what to do if you think you may be sick. https://t.co/Py4CwrG8xz
While #US monitors the #coronavirus you can stay up to date on the latest developments and travel advisories from @CDCgov.  https://t.co/slInuLbgtG

Today @realDonaldTrump signed the emergency funding #congress passed this week to combat #coronavirus. This $ will help speed the development of vaccines increase access to testing & treatments & expand access to telemedicine to combat this disease.
How hackers could take advantage of the coronavirus scare: https://t.co/A2szssaWm5

Today I supported bipartisan emergency funding to provide resources to @CDCgov & other govt agencies fighting #coronavirus.  Though the risk to many Americans remains low it's impt that we are prepared & fully equipped to combat the spread of this disease. https://t.co/HVVni0dCas

Kicking off #FSGG @AppropsDems @HouseAppropsGOP hearing with @stevenmnuchin1 @USTreasury. I’d like to learn more about #Coronavirus effect on #US economy & how the financial sector deals w #cyberattacks.
If you're looking for the most up-to-date info on #COVID19 check out @CDCgov & their website for tips and any new developments. https://t.co/fxtCAGSliy https://t.co/pIJz3GyzvW

Thx @realdonaldtrump & @VP’s #coronavirus task force for keeping #US updated & informed. Next step - Congress shld support resources that allow the task force to keep up w their work & stay steps ahead of this virus. Stay up to date here: https://t.co/BI7qOA4nAX
